title: Auto Detailing
shortDescription: Complete interior and exterior detailing service

seo.metaDescription: Thorough interior and exterior detailing that restores clarity, cleanliness, and protection—ideal prep for coatings and PPF.

image.caption: Premium mobile auto detailing at your location

hero.headline: Auto Detailing
hero.subheadline: Thorough interior and exterior detailing that restores clarity, cleanliness, and protection—setting the stage for coatings and film.

overview.summary: Professional mobile auto detailing service that brings the detail shop to your location.

whatItIs.description: Complete interior + exterior service focused on deep cleaning, decontamination, and entry-level protection. The ideal baseline before paint correction, ceramic coating, or paint protection film (PPF).
benefits: Removes bonded contaminants (rail dust, overspray, brake fallout)
Restores gloss and clarity with safe wash + clay process
Interior deep clean: carpets, seats, vents, touch points
Protective sealant applied for short-term hydrophobics
Prepares paint for advanced services (Correction, Coating, PPF)

steps.title: Assessment & Prep
bullets: Inspection of paint and interior condition
Foam and hand wash with contact-safe media

steps.title: Decontamination
bullets: Surface prepped for correction and protection
Crisp, glossy finish that restores your vehicle's showroom look
Fresh, hygienic cabin with deep interior cleaning
Contaminant-free surface that maximizes Ceramic Coating/PPF bond

items.q: How long does auto detailing take?
items.a: Typically 2-4 hours for standard vehicles and details. Paint correction, ceramic coating, and PPF typically take much longer.

items.q: Do you bring water and power?
items.a: Yes. We are fully mobile and bring filtered water, power, and all professional equipment.

items.q: Will detailing remove scratches or swirls?
items.a: No. Paint correction is needed to removes swirls and light scratches; deep defects may need automotive bodywork.

items.q: Is detailing required before Ceramic Coating or PPF?
items.a: Yes. A pristine, contaminant-free surface is essential and benefits from multi-stage correction.

mainEntity.name: How long does auto detailing take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Typically 5–8 hours for standard vehicles and details.

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. We bring filtered water, power, and all professional equipment.
